title: Don't Be a Jealous Ex (Romeo Santos Interview)
itunes:title: Don't Be a Jealous Ex (Romeo Santos Interview)
description:
Today on the show we had a Latin superstar in the building who is Romeo Santos!! He spoke about Dominican Republic,  Kissing Fans and Fatherhood. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Chris Brown for allegedly throwing shade to his ex Karrueche's new boo Victor Cruz, however, Chris Brown is claiming he was hacked! Moreover, since Chris can't seem to get over his ex, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners did anything crazy to their ex. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
